channel.title: Alright guys i need help
channel.description:
hey guys, well i was putting my easyrsc server onto my dedi. idk if i added the info in correctly even but i got this bind error
it basically says [java] java.net BindException: cannot assign requested address: bind
i added the dedi's ip at the top beside where it says -remote desktop to the server.java and i still get the same thing
please help me guys
i was also trying to do it the no-ip way but i cant figure out how to do that either.
please gimme a tut on the no-ip, if anyone has a link, or can make a brief one in this topic that would be great.
if not just tell me how to do it with the dedi's ips ty :P

item.title: Alright guys i need help
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:1, topic:331286”]How exactly do you portforward a ‘dedi’?

Portforwarding is when you have multiple machines sat behind a router, so you tell the router to forward all traffic on X port to X IP address. I honestly don’t get how/why you would portforward a ‘dedi’[/quote]

Thaa Firewall.

Many people using a vps have this kind of problems and that just means your all so fucking stupid.
goto controllpanel>connection setting>right cllick on your network>choose status> and look at YOUR IP.

Your welcome I just salved you a problem that a 9year old kid could do.

Read full topic
